name: socialism-app
description: Full-stack Node.js + React application with Prisma ORM

scripts.install: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --kill-others "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma db push --force-reset && npm run db:seed
scripts.dev:stop: pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true && pkill -f nodemon || true && pkill -f vite || true && pkill -f 'node src/index.js' || true
